body:
I've actually been planning this montage for a long time, and started collecting clips a few months ago. It's a collection of some of my best rushes, and plays, that I haven't used on other videos. Anyways, it's already 2015 in like half the world, so I thought I'd might as well release this. Happy new year, and hope you enjoy! Btw thanks to Frosted for introducing two of these songs to me :P

http://youtu.be/hlBbVzqXnTE
